proposal:
Hello Value Finance community! 🖐️

We heard you're on an amazing journey to redefine decentralized finance. That's a noble quest! It's like trying to find a unicorn in a field of horses. 🦄

We're here to offer you some tools to make that journey smoother. Think of us like the pit stop crew in a race. We don't drive the car, but we sure do provide the tools to keep it running smoothly. 🛠️

We have a range of B2B tools that align with your vision, including a DEX, Lottery, Wallet, Farming, DAO, CrossChain, and IDOFactory - Launchpad. 

With these tools, you can create your own DEX based on Uniswap V2, a blockchain-based lottery, a multicurrency crypto wallet, ERC20 Staking & Yield Farming, governance and proposals for your VFT token, an EVM compatible blockchain bridge, and a Launchpad solution for IDO pools and token locking.

And the best part? It's all B2B, so you're not just playing, you're creating. You can even use your VFT tokens if you want. 

So, how about it? Ready to take your journey to the next level? Check us out at https://t.me/onoutdemos. We're like the Swiss Army knife of B2B tools. But don't worry, we won't ask you to fix a watch with us. 😄

Looking forward to hearing from you!
